item.title: 科斯拉（Khosla）支持的能源初创公司获得 2.58 亿美元资金，帮助为数据中心供电
item.description:
Mainspring能源公司的发电机可使用不同类型的气体，包括无碳氢气。【原文：

Mainspring Energy’s generators are able to run on different types of gas, including carbon-free hydrogen.

】

item.title: 欧佩克在贸易战中下调今明两年石油需求预测
item.description: 欧佩克下调了今明两年全球石油需求增长预测，因为唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税攻势对石油消费造成了影响。【原文：OPEC cut forecasts for global oil demand growth this year and next as President Donald Trump’s tariff onslaught takes a toll on consumption.】

item.title: 特朗普 "独角兽经济学 "的失败
item.description:
创造制造业繁荣很难

Creating a manufacturing boom is hard

】

item.title: 美国煤炭反弹归因于天然气价格上涨而非特朗普
item.description:
总统曾吹嘘他将扩大化石燃料的使用，但长期前景并不乐观。【原文：

The president has boasted he’ll expand use of the fossil fuel, but the long-term outlook isn’t rosy.

】

item.title: 黎巴嫩承诺在经济改革计划中全额偿还储户存款
item.description: 黎巴嫩经济部长阿米尔-比萨特（Amer Bisat）表示，作为金融改革的一部分，黎巴嫩储户将在一段时间内拿回他们的钱，国家、中央银行和地方银行将共同承担修复危机经济的重任。【原文：Lebanese depositors will get their money back over time as part of any financial overhaul, with the state, central bank and local banks sharing the burden of repairing the crisis-stricken economy, Economy Minister Amer Bisat said.】

item.title: 迪拜酋长公司支持的 Zara 运营商据说将暂停首次公开募股
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中东 Zara 服装和维珍大卖场连锁店的运营商已暂停首次公开募股计划，专注于业务运营。【原文：The operator of Zara clothing and Virgin Megastore chains in the Middle East has paused plans for an initial public offering to focus on its business operations, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 即使电池价格下跌，CATL 的净收入仍增长了 33
item.description: 中国电池制造巨头当代安培科技有限公司（Contemporary Amperex Technology Co.中国电池生产巨头当代安培科技股份有限公司（Contemporary Amperex Technology Co.【原文：Chinese battery making giant Contemporary Amperex Technology Co. Ltd. reported a 33% jump in first-quarter earnings, defying a slowdown in demand for electric vehicles and a drop in the prices of the cells that power them.】

item.title: 政治家》杂志主编称美国和欧盟应联合起来在贸易问题上对抗中国
item.description: 这位拥有 Politico 和 Business Insider 的德国亿万富翁说，他 "比以往任何时候都更乐观 "地认为，美国和欧洲可以建立贸易联盟来对抗中国。【原文：The German billionaire who owns Politico and Business Insider said he is “more optimistic than ever” that the US and Europe can establish a trade alliance to take on China.】

item.title: 南非 Eskom 公司为可再生能源部门招标
item.description: 南非电力公司 Eskom Holdings SOC Ltd.为建立独立的可再生能源业务进行招标。【原文：South African power utility Eskom Holdings SOC Ltd. invited tenders for the establishment of a standalone renewable energy business.】

item.title: 旧金山市长用美丽和文化赢得科技业务
item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth，这是我们的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，埃德-勒德洛（Ed Ludlow）将讨论旧金山市长卢里为吸引科技产业所做的推介。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Ed Ludlow discusses San Francisco Mayor Lurie’s pitch to attract the technology industry.】

item.title: 盈利预测混乱埋下风险，科技分析师静观其变
item.description: 由于美国关税威胁到整个行业，华尔街分析师尚未大幅下调对科技公司盈利的预期，这让人们普遍怀疑股票估值是否已经降得足够低，或者价格是否还有进一步下跌的空间。【原文：Wall Street analysts have yet to dramatically cut estimates for tech-company earnings as US tariffs threaten to upend the industry, sowing widespread doubt over whether stock valuations have come down enough or prices have further to fall.】

item.title: 中国贸易战对美国的影响力日益明显
item.description: 贸易战没有赢家。但是，即使人人都是输家，关税战场上的某些人却比其他人更有筹码。【原文：There are no winners in a trade war. But even as everyone loses, some on the tariff battlefield have more leverage than others.】

item.title: 彼得-蒂尔加入浓缩铀初创公司 General Matter 董事会
item.description:
这家核电公司在新一轮融资中筹集了 5000 万美元。【原文：

The nuclear power company has raised $50 million in a new funding round.  

】

item.title: 特朗普在关税问题上迈出一小步，中国却希望大跃进
item.description: 特朗普对消费电子产品和半导体的关税豁免表明，美中贸易紧张局势可能已经达到顶峰。【原文：Trump’s tariff exemption on consumer electronics and semiconductors suggests US-China trade tensions may have peaked.】

item.title: 市场动荡不安，智利债务对冲面临亏空风险
item.description: 在智利比索兑美元汇率下挫达 6% 的一个月里，财政部对该国外国债券的对冲政策可能不足以避免债务负担的飙升。【原文：In a month that saw the Chilean peso sink as much as 6% against the dollar, the Finance Ministry’s hedging policy on the country’s foreign bonds may not be enough to avoid a jump in the debt burden.】

item.title: Tether 成为行业崩溃后的主要加密货币借贷者
item.description: 自几年前几乎摧毁整个加密借贷行业的暴跌以来，最大的稳定币发行商 Tether Holdings SA 已成为数字资产市场流动性的主要来源之一。【原文：The largest stablecoin issuer, Tether Holdings SA, has become one of the major sources of liquidity in the digital asset market since the crash that nearly wiped out the entire crypto-lending sector several years ago.】

item.title: 欧盟计划于五月公布逐步淘汰俄罗斯燃料的路线图
item.description: 欧盟计划在 5 月初提出逐步淘汰俄罗斯化石燃料的措施，试图在减少对莫斯科进口依赖的政治目标和降低濒临崩溃的工业能源成本的需要之间取得平衡。【原文：The European Union is planning to outline steps to phase out Russian fossil fuels in early May, seeking to reconcile its political objective of reducing import dependence on Moscow and the need to lower energy costs for the ailing industry.】

item.title: 在急于寻找材料之际，英国任命了新的英国钢铁公司负责人
item.description: 英国钢铁公司任命了一个新的临时领导班子，因为英国官员正急于确保英国最后一家主要钢铁制造商所需的原材料。【原文：British Steel appointed a new interim leadership team as UK officials rush to secure the raw materials needed to keep Britain’s last primary steel manufacturer running.】

item.title: 美国关税战硝烟弥漫，南非制造商改变策略
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税引发的不确定性不断上升，正迫使南非制造商重新思考对世界最大消费市场的依赖。【原文：The rising uncertainty triggered by US President Donald Trump’s tariffs is forcing South African manufacturers to rethink their reliance on the world’s biggest consumer market.】

item.title: 非洲风险资本流入连续第二年减少
item.description: 去年，非洲初创企业获得的风险投资资金再次缩水，但本土投资者所占的比例有所上升。【原文：Venture capital funding for African startups shrank again last year, though the share of home-grown investors advanced.】

item.title: 巴克莱银行就 350 万英镑退休费起诉前银行家
item.description: 一名前高级银行家从巴克莱银行退休后在一家对冲基金公司任职，巴克莱银行正在寻求阻止向他支付超过 350 万英镑（460 万美元）的延期付款。【原文：Barclays Plc is seeking to block more than £3.5 million ($4.6 million) in deferred payments to a former senior banker after he retired from the lender and then took up a job at a hedge fund.】

item.title: 美国资产不再令风险至上的世界艳羡
item.description:
根本性转变已经形成

。【原文：

A fundamental shift has taken hold

】

item.title: 迪拜房地产涨幅达 70% 面临关税动荡威胁
item.description: 过去四年来，迪拜的房地产价格飙升了 70%，表现优于其他大城市。由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税政策扰乱了市场，这种无情的繁荣现在面临着自大流行病以来最大的威胁。【原文：Over the last four years, Dubai property prices have surged 70% and outperformed other major cities. That relentless boom now faces its biggest threat since the pandemic as US President Donald Trump’s tariffs roil markets.】

item.title: 富国银行将拓展新重组的科技商业银行业务
item.description: 富国银行（Wells Fargo & Co.）正通过增聘员工深入中小型企业的技术银行业务，以求在该行业的交易和融资中分一杯羹。【原文：Wells Fargo & Co. is pushing deeper into technology banking for small to midsize firms through staffing additions, as it seeks to capture a larger slice of the industry’s deals and financings.】

item.title: 关税前科技需求带动台币交易量激增
item.description: 台币交易量跃升至 16 年来的新高，原因是美元下滑，而且在美国加征关税之前，外国对本地电子产品的需求得到了提振。【原文：Taiwan dollar trading volumes jumped to a 16-year high as the greenback slumped and foreign demand for local electronics received a boost before US tariffs.】

item.title: 英特尔即将公布向银湖出售 Altera 的交易
item.description: 英特尔公司（Intel Corp. ）即将达成协议，向银湖管理公司（Silver Lake Management）出售其可编程芯片部门的股份，这家陷入困境的美国公司正开始分拆非中心业务和资产。【原文：Intel Corp. is nearing an agreement to sell a stake in its programmable chips unit to Silver Lake Management, as the struggling US company begins to spin off non-central businesses and assets.】

item.title: 贡渥集团（Gunvor）称，60美元的石油价格已预示今年需求不会增长
item.description: 交易商贡渥集团（Gunvor Group）的研究主管认为，在上周最严重的经济衰退期间，石油价格跌破每桶60美元，意味着今年的需求增长为零，这很可能是一种过度反应。【原文：Oil’s slump below $60 a barrel during the worst of last week’s rout had priced in zero demand growth this year, and was probably an overreaction, according to the head of research at trader Gunvor Group.】

item.title: 股市剧烈波动预示着交易员将面临持久麻烦
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）暂停征收广泛关税 90 天，市场对此作出了膝跳式反应，推动美国股市在上周创下了历史上最好的表现之一。具有讽刺意味的是，这可能预示着股票投资者将面临艰难时期。【原文：A knee-jerk reaction to President Donald Trump’s 90-day pause on broad tariffs propelled US stocks to one of their best days on record last week. Ironically, that could be a harbinger of tough times for equity investors.】

item.title: 中美紧张局势升级，中国掀起黄金交易狂潮
item.description: 上周，随着黄金交易量连续创下历史新高，以及中美贸易紧张局势加剧，中国的黄金交易出现了爆炸性的增长。【原文：China saw an explosive surge in gold trading last week as the metal hit successive records and Sino-US trade tensions rose.】

item.title: 印尼将通过金融和投资交易寻求美国的贸易青睐
item.description: 印尼将在华盛顿举行的为期一周的会谈中寻求达成贸易、投资和金融部门协议，以防止或减轻其最大贸易伙伴之一计划征收的关税。【原文：Indonesia will seek to strike trade, investment and financial-sector deals in week-long talks in Washington aimed at forestalling or mitigating planned tariffs from one of its biggest trading partners.】
